about_the_game:
Embark on a grand quest as Flame, an anthropomorphic dragon, as he leaves his home in the sky for the dangerous world below to find and rescue his girlfriend Crystal from the nefarious General Mechos in this modernized love-letter to classic action-adventure games from the NES and SNES!

This demo is only a small slice of the full game; it features 4 levels, 2 villages, a boss fight, and some story elements from the full game. In this retro-inspired 2D sidescroller, use your sword and spells to overcome enemies, and explore a large overworld outside of levels full of hidden areas waiting to be discovered. Level-up your gear at a blacksmith, and upgrade your stats by defeating enemies!

Save data from the demo will be transferable to the final release of the game.
